title: Etiquetas de colores Thunderbird
content: Hola Tengo 2 ordenador con Thunderbird y con el mismo correo en los dos ordenadores y las etiquetas de colores funcionan perfectamente, si cualquiera de los dos usuarios pone un color a un email, al otro le sale al momento. Hay un tercer ordenador con Windows 10 Pro al cual otras dos personas se conectan en remoto y las etiquetas que se cambian, a veces funcionan y a veces no. Cada uno tiene una sesión, y un Thunderbird con su cuenta o cuentas de correo. Las 4 cuentas están configuras en IMAP. ¿A alguien se le ocurre lo que puede estar pasando? Muchas gracias
creator: McANGULO

title: pop3 password disappeared
content: After a Windows 10 update, I find my pop3 server password has disappeared and I can no longer download e-mail to Thunderbird. I can't see any way to restore it. I can still send mail as the smtp password is present. All other settings seem OK. I can access my mail through the browser, but I want Thunderbird to download the messages.
creator: peter.bavington

title: TB 115.0 The quickfilter is broken / losing focus when using shortcut keys
content:
For the release version of TB 115.0

The quickfilter is broken is a particular manner: 

   some characters can be entered in the quickfilter-box.    other characters (i.e. 'r', 'o'  the reply-shortcut key?) fail to be inserted/loses focus, and instead the reply- or open-message-action is initiated for the selected message.

I have not tested this extensively, but the issue shows up on my Win10 32-bit system
creator: GAJA

title: Email import/export.
content: Hello people at support. I need to export my emails as the mail server is being changed. Could you please tell me how to export and import email accounts on my computer.
creator: mehran3

title: Windows 10 , PC restart on july 5 installed new thunderbird, I cannot open it or complete setup
content: I shut down my PC for 3 days early July, -rebooted on july 5 , new version of Thunderbird was installed since then I cannot complete the new configuration - agrees the account is good, but fails to complete. I have replaced the new version w/ newest version on july 12 , same result - cannot complete setup , fails w/ error message "Unable to login at server- probably configuration , user name or password "
creator: Tommac207

title: Menu Bar appears below toolbar, should be above toolbar (115/Windows10)
content:
Hi. I really like the new look of 115, but the file menu should be above the toolbar. Is there a way to put the file menu at the top of the window (above the toolbar)?

Thanks
creator: allan58

title: Thunderbird sporadically high processor use, consumes tons of power on idle
content:
Thunderbird 115.0 (though also happened on 102), M2 macbook pro; OS up to date.

On AC & battery, thunderbird uses up huge amounts of power sporadically in its background activity, taking up ~50-80% of processor power & hundreds of gb virtual memory (see activity monitor screenshot attached). Computer gets pretty hot to touch with thunderbird on, which I don't see with other apps. Troubleshooting info below.

This has been happening for several months now, since I switched to thunderbird & was hoping it would resolve at 115. I can't find any correlation with other usage patterns of the computer (ie I dont think it's correlated with idle usage, but not willing to stage reputation on that).

Thanks so much for any help!

creator: Shivam222

title: Select All button
content:
I have asked this same question a couple three years ago. All I got back then was push back.

So, if I may, allow me to ask again....

There used to be a Select All button available in the add-ons. But that option is no longer available.

I had presented use cases for the simple addition of a Select All button in the Customize area.

Yet all i got in response was comments like, ~if that's what you want, write your own button.~

Is this community that acrid?

So i will ask again, there seems to have been a major UI overhaul in Thunderbird of late.

And a Select All button was left out.

Should i go explore other email options?

I mean really, what is so difficult about implementing such a basic UI button in the UI?


Really....
creator: mike.543

title: Searching in TB
content: I am not sure if I am doing something wrong or if it's just a bug in Thunderbird, but when I go to search for things - for example, I know there is an email with "$17.99" quoted somewhere in the email. So I type 17.99 up in the search box, and no results are found. I, however, change my search to "Paypal" and look for that term and that will bring up several emails containing "Paypal" and within those emails I will see the email with the "17.99" quoted within it. Why does TB choose not to recognize numerical data? Thank you, John
creator: jmiller21
